description.value:
Favored Weapon: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Glaive]{Glaive}

The Order of the Pyre is dedicated to eliminating those faiths and beliefs they consider to be a threat to the Inner Sea region. They are particularly keen on stamping out dangerous cults.

Lesser Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Righteous Resistance]{Righteous Resistance}

Greater Benefit: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Spiritual Disruption]{Spiritual Disruption}
